General.Name: Cineline India Limited
General.Description: Cineline India Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the ownership and leasing of real estate properties in India. It identifies and acquires commercial properties and rents retail, parking, and advertising spaces across markets, such as Mumbai and Nagpur. The company owns and leases theatres in Patiala, Ghaziabad, Sion, Andheri East, Goregaon, Kandivali, Mira Road, Thane, Nagpur, and Nasik under the MovieMax brand; and rents commercial spaces to various brands at Eternity mall, Nagpur. It owns and operates 1 windmill in Gujarat with a power generation capacity of 0.6 MWA; and 1 in Maharashtra with a power generation capacity of 1.6 MWA. The company was formerly known as Cinemax Properties Limited and changed its name to Cineline India Limited in March 2013. Cineline India Limited was incorporated in 2002 and is headquartered in Mumbai, India.

8.Name: Ms. Manisha  Vora
